website_summaries.verdict: The Adipure SP garners praises among many purchasers for being stylish and comfortable. The minimal-looking lugs draws its looks closer to casual shoes that many users found themselves using this trainer for everyday. Some found it pricey at $190, but given all its features and versatility, the cost becomes justified.
pros: The majority comments that the Adidas Adipure SP provides out-of-the-box comfort that doesn’t need breaking in
A high number of purchasers gives plus points to its premium, modern, and sleek look
The Boost is the main selling point that has pushed several consumers into buying the trainer
The responsive cushioning system keeps the foot from getting tired even after reaching the 18 holes, said some testers
Though a small number of reviewers find its price point a bit high, it was all well worth it given its performance
Because of its versatile style and minimal-looking treads spikeless outsole, a couple of golfers use this as their everyday shoe
Some of the golfers who have put this shoe to the test appreciate that it keeps the foot unexpectedly dry
cons: The leather upper easily displays scuffs, which disappoints several customers

customer_reviews.title: Sole lost color after 1 round
customer_reviews.text: The pink sole was my favorite part of this shoe and the reason I bought it. Unfortunately the sole lost all its color and turned clear after one round.
customer_reviews.author: Miles August

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and style of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and style of these shoes. Very comfortable, too. Order them 1/2 size larger. I use them for dress or everyday shoes as the golf tread is so minimal it is not noticeable. They scuff easily so I just use mink oil or clear shoe polish or oil on them. The white /Tan side soles get dirty, but clean up well with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Business casual Adidas? Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: They’re friggin Adidas that you can wear businesses casual! How cool is that? I love Adidas, wear them everywhere. And now I can wear them when I’m a little dressed up as well. The sole isn’t spiked enough that you can’t wear it casually. Actually The minimal spikes would lead me to think it was not very good for golfing. But I don’t care, as that’s not what I bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size bigger than you think you need.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves are great, but I think Adidas makes them about a half size too small. I only played one round but my toes and feet hurt afterwards so I returned them and am waiting on a different size. I can tell that they are durable and will last a long time, and out on the course you cannot tell that these are spikeless. The grip is just as good, and they look good too. I had to return them because of the size, but otherwise, great shoe
customer_reviews.author: NOFAN

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Functionality Meet
customer_reviews.text: Loved these so much I bought a pair for my son and will buy a 2nd pair for myself (different color). These were great out of the box and fit like a glove after 10 rounds. I haven’t slipped out of one shot even in wet conditions. Love the style. They might scuff a bit but touch up perfectly. Highly recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort of these shoes. Summers are hot and humid where I play, but the shoes do not seem to get too overheated. Yes, they do not have cleats and I slip occasionally, but the comfort is worth the one or two slips per round. The price was reasonable, although the SP2 seems to have gone up in price
customer_reviews.author: lilbuck51

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this shoe, but it runs small compared to other adidas size 13.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My son got these shoes, was only able to play couple times before covid shut courses down. He is happy with the way they look and perform. Will continue to test them when we can go golfing again...hopefully soon !
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like wearing pillows on your feet! These shoes are without a doubt the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn. I walk 18 holes whenever I can and I couldn't be happier with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these golf shoes. Very good support and the bounce in the sole keeps your feet from getting tired. The inside of the shoe is plush by comparison to other shoes. These shoes are premium and reflects the price.
customer_reviews.author: Capitan Bill

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on air!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from WI where I put these through their paces with back to back 36 hole walking rounds. They are the best golf shoes I've ever owned, (I've bought 3 pairs in the last year). They grip sufficiently, even in the wet and keep your feet unexpectedly dry. WAY more comfortable than my Ecco's and not too hot in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of adidas footwear. These golf shoes are extremely comfortable. They fit just as I expected them to.
customer_reviews.author: nick chiarella

customer_reviews.title: Casual walker for the golf course
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable, good looking walking shoe that looks good with shorts or long pants.
customer_reviews.author: MFSI

customer_reviews.title: Light but small
customer_reviews.text: Light, but a little small. Wish I ordered up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Forget the days of stiff and uncomfortbale golf shoes. These will mold to your feet and feel like slippers after just a round or two. Tough to keep clean but what white shoe isn't?
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sallen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Since it's winter I've not yet tried the shoes on the course, but they look and feel great! Size is as expected. I like them so much I bought the Navy and Black and they're not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Norman T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Adipure golf shoe has very thick soles and cushions that gives you comfort which will last all day. The design of the shoe allows you to wear with either golf attire or casual clothes. Awesome shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I find these golf shoes to be stylish, comfortable, and dependable. They look great, feel great, and provide proper stability and waterproofing for golf conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this men’s golf shoe, because they were cute. Converted sizing to women’s. Comfortable golf shoes-can’t wait for the weather to warm up for the golf season!
customer_reviews.author: cycler

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable everyday type golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and comfortable. Love the pink sole and everyday wear look. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Pinawat

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend says they are super comfortable! He absolutely loves them. I think they are cute and go well with jeans, slacks, or sweats.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: Looks good at the golf course but also looks nice just to wear casually....
customer_reviews.text: Any shoe that is comfortable as soon as you put it on is a good shoe. This one is just that!
customer_reviews.author: El guly

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great hybrid shoe. Wear them to work and then straight to the course. Super comfy and get a ton of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfy golf shoe around. I use it for work.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L Deloach

customer_reviews.title: Quality Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction, comfortable fit, stylish enough to wear off the course as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: I need to return them for a 1/2 size bigger , because I ordered my size ..  they are small 🙄
customer_reviews.text: They need to inform the consumer that the shoes run small !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: Definitely run a 1/2 too small. Other than that these shoes are perfect
customer_reviews.author: John Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I thought this for my son's birthday , he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe I’ve ever had. Light. Comfortable. Clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Petrosian

customer_reviews.title: I got two pairs and would buy more on sale
customer_reviews.text: Water proof? Yes! comfortable? yes! Nice quality look? Yes! It is leather upper. It is good for cooler weather I think. Definitely not for hot days as these dont breath very well. Wish these came with wide sizes. I normally dont wear wide sizes but these ones would work better if they were little wider. Good price as I got them on sale. Good looking shoes...good enough to wear them as A dress shoes!
customer_reviews.author: davichi

customer_reviews.title: really comfortable but look dress casual.
customer_reviews.text: If you require extra room in the toe box area but don't need a wide shoe get a 1/2 a size bigger. I got 11's when 10.5's would have been long enough but it would have been tight in the toe box in a 10.5.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $190. More like $50.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I thought they looked so cool on Dustin Johnson at the PGA championship. Well they don’t look nearly as cool in person and with shorts on. Girlfriend and I call them “grandpa shoes” because of how chunky they are. Comfort: 5/5 Durability: 4/5 Value: 1/5 I would be happy if I had paid $45 for these, but at $190 I regret buying them.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, second pair of Adipure’s I’ve purchased. Most comfortable spikeless golf shoes, rival the Ecco Biom Hybrids.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Miller

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Adipure Sp Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Spikeless golf shoe incorporates ¾-length boost midsole foam in heel and midfoot for walking comfort and endless energy.
feature_bullets: Classic street meets pure elegance in this design which features premium materials, rich detailing and world class performance technologies to take spikeless performance to a whole new level
Street wide last has a rounded toe shape and increased forefoot volume for a versatile fit and all day comfort
Leather ThinSOF upper with climaproof for the ultimate in durability, protection, elegance, and comfort
Low-Resilience memory foam EVA sock liner with leather cover provides great cushioning, fit, support and comfort

Translucent rubberized 1-piece TPU outsole features 108 strategically-placed Traxion lugs, internal cushion ribs and ultra thin construction for tour level traction, enhanced comfort and outstanding flexibility
